remarks: Two atoms sharing a nonzero vector are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lsat2el.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsat2el.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsat2el.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsat2el.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. A ) $.
lsat2el.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsat2el.x $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .0. ) $.
lsat2el.x1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
lsat2el.x2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. Q ) $.
lsat2el $p |- ( ph -> P = Q ) $.
